wordGroup: postpartum depression 产后忧郁症，产后抑郁

sentences.en: After my birth, Mom had severe postpartum depression.
sentences.cn: 我出生后，妈妈得了严重的产后抑郁症。

sentences.en: Postpartum depression can really bring down an audience.
sentences.cn: 产后抑郁确实可以让观众沮丧。

sentences.en: Those effects lasted up to a year postpartum, they found.
sentences.cn: 他们发现，这些影响一直会持续到产后一年。
